values.help: Enable/Disable ALL ON/OFF
values.label: Enable/Disable ALL ON/OFF

items.label: ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF active
ALL ON active / ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON active / ALL OFF active

values.help: Choose which command classes are sent to associated devices.
values.label: Associations command class choice

items.label: Normal (Dimmer) - BASIC SET/SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_START/STOP
Normal (RGBW) - COLOR_CONTROL_SET/START/STOP_STATE_CHANGE
Normal (RGBW) - COLOR_CONTROL_SET
Brightness - BASIC SET/SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_START/STOP
Rainbow (RGBW) - COLOR_CONTROL_SET

values.help: Choose the behaviour of transitions between different levels.
values.label: Outputs state change mode

items.label: MODE 1 - Constant Speed (speed is defined by parameters 9 and 10)
MODE 2 - Constant Time (RGB/RBGW only. Time is defined by parameter 11)

values.help: Size of the step for each change in level during the transition.
values.label: Dimming step value (for MODE 1)

values.help: Time between each step in a transition between levels.  Setting this to zero means an instantaneous change.
values.label: Time between dimming steps (for MODE 1)

values.help: 0 - immediate change; 1->63: 20ms->126ms (value*20ms); 65->127: 1s->63s (value-64)*1s; 129->191: 10s->630s (value-128)*10s; 193->255: 1min->63min (value-192)*1min.  Default setting: 67 (3s)
values.label: Time to complete the entire transition (for MODE 2)

values.help: Maximum brightness level for the dimmer
values.label: Maximum dimmer level

values.help: Minimum brightness level for the dimmer
values.label: Minimum dimmer level

values.help: This is too complex to describe here, since this value is built up from 4-bits for each of the 4 channels.  Refer to the table in the product manual.  Default value is 4369 (1111 in hex).
values.label: Inputs / Outputs configuration

values.help: Option double click (lighting set at 100%). 0 - Double click disabled, 1 - Double click enabled. Default setting 1
values.label: Option double click

items.label: Double click disabled
Double click enabled

values.help: Saving state before power failure
values.label: Saving state before power failure

items.label: State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to OFF upon power restore
State saved at power failure, all outputs are set to previous state upon power restore

values.help: Alarm of any type (general alarm, water flooding alarm, smoke alarm: CO, CO2, temperature alarm).  Default setting 0 (Inactive)
values.label: Alarm

items.label: INACTIVE - no response to alarm frames
ALARM ON - the device turns on once alarm is detected (all channels set to 99%)
ALARM OFF - the device turns off once alarm is detected (all channels set to 0%)
ALARM PROGRAM - alarm sequence turns on (program selected in parameter 38)

values.help: Program number selected from the 10 available.
values.label: Alarm sequence program

values.help: In ALARM PROGRAM mode (see parameter 30), this defines the time in seconds the program lasts (1s->65534s)
values.label: Active PROGRAM alarm time

values.help: Specify which command class is used to report output status changes
values.label: Command class reporting Outputs status change

items.label: Reporting as a result of inputs and controllers actions (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Reporting as a result inputs actions (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Reporting as a result inputs actions (COLOUR_CONTROL)

values.help: Parameter defines a value by which input voltage must change in order to be reported to the main controller. New value is calculated based on last reported value: Default setting: 5 (0.5V).  Range: 1->100 - (0.1V->10V).
values.label: Reporting 0-10v analog inputs change threshold

values.help: Sent if last reported value differs from the current value. Reports will also be sent in case of polling. Default setting: 30 (30s).  Range: 1->65534 (1s->65534s) - interval between reports.  Zero means reports are only sent in the case of polling, or at turning OFF the device
values.label: Power load reporting frequency

values.help: Interval between energy consumption reports (in kWh). New reported energy consumption value is calculated based on last reported value. 1->254 (0.01kWh->2.54kWh).  Zero means changes in consumed energy will not be reported, except in case of polling.
values.label: Reporting changes in energy consumed by controlled devices

values.help: Set whether to remember the previous RGB mix after the brightness has fallen to zero (black)
values.label: Response to BRIGHTNESS set to 0%

items.label: Illumination colour set to white (all channels controlled together)
Last set colour is memorized

values.help: First predefined program to use when device is set to work in RGB/RGBW mode (parameter 14)
values.label: Starting predefined program

values.help: Behaviour when an input is triple-clicked
values.label: Triple Click Action

items.label: NODE INFO control frame is sent
Start favourite program
